title: NGO job in Bhubaneswar
company: Swabhiman - State Disability Information and Resource Centre
jobDescription: Swabhiman is State Disability Information and Resource Centre which works for empowerment of persons with disabilities. It is a non-governmental, non profit-making organization founded in 2001. Swabhiman is all about working towards self-determination, equal opportunities and self-respect of persons with disabilities. Our work is grounded in a rights based framework which links disability issues to a full range of civil, political, economic, social and cultural rights. It also seeks to create greater awareness among governments and other relevant institutions of their obligations to fulfill, respect, protect and promote human rights. It supports persons with disabilities, both individually and collectively, to claim their rights.
